tool.name: DownloadMapDocument
tool.summary: Given the name of a map document that's been embedded in the Workflow Manager database, this tool downloads the map document from the DB and saves it to a file.
tool.usage:
• The default Workflow Manager database must be set before running this tool.

  • The user running this tool must have administrative access to the Workflow Manager database.

param.name: in_string_sourceName
param.displayname: Source Name (name of MXD to retrieve from database)
param.dialogReference:
The name of the MXD to be downloaded from the Workflow Manager database.

The domain for this parameter is dynamically populated based on the map documents that are stored in the DB.
param.pythonReference:
The name of the MXD to be downloaded from the Workflow Manager database.

The domain for this parameter is dynamically populated based on the map documents that are stored in the DB.

param.name: out_file_mxdFile
param.displayname: Target Map Document (path to output MXD file)
param.dialogReference: The name and location of the file to which the map document should be saved.
param.pythonReference: The name and location of the file to which the map document should be saved.

param.name: in_string_wmxDatabaseAlias
param.dialogReference: An optional parameter specifying that this tool should run on some database other than the default Workflow Manager database. If left blank, the default Workflow Manager database will be used.
param.pythonReference: An optional parameter specifying that this tool should run on some database other than the default Workflow Manager database. If left blank, the default Workflow Manager database will be used.

dataIdInfo.idAbs: Given the name of a map document that's been embedded in the Workflow Manager database, this tool downloads the map document from the DB and saves it to a file.
